analysis.key_quote: I respectfully urge OPM to withdraw the Schedule Policy/Career proposal. By converting competitive‐service positions into at‐will appointments, this rule will inevitably shift federal decision‐making away from objective, law‐based analyses and toward political priorities.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization, the erosion of merit-based systems, and the potential loss of institutional knowledge, all of which align with a defense of current civil service protections.
